detaileddescription.para: < XDK dummy certificate to be flashed for enabling Enterprise WPA2 connection

briefdescription.para: This will enable the WLAN host programming.
This will setup the WLAN host programming.
WLANHostPgmUploadCertificate will upload the WLANHostPgmXdkDummyCertificate to the WLAN chip.

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK on success, or an error code otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: This module handles the WLAN Host Programming services. (Flashing XDK dummy certificate for Enterprise WPA2 connection onto the WLAN chip)
